food.question: I am yellow and you peel me before you eat me. Monkeys like me!

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys love to eat me.
💛 I am the color of sunshine.
🌱 I grow on trees.

food.question: I am round and red and grow on trees. Sometimes I am in your lunchbox.

hints.text: ❤️ I am often red.
🌳 I grow in an orchard.
🐛 Sometimes there is a worm inside!

food.question: I am long and orange and bunnies like to eat me.

hints.text: 🥕 Bunnies like to munch on me.
🧡 I am orange in color.
🌱 I grow under the ground.

food.question: I am white and you drink me. Cows give me.

hints.text: 🥛 I am a liquid.
🐄 Cows help us make me.
💪 I make your bones strong.

food.question: I am small and green and grow in a pod. You can eat me as a snack.

hints.text: 🟢 I am a vegetable.
🌱 I grow in a shell.
🥣 You might eat me with soup!

food.question: I am round and can be red or green. I am juicy and grow on vines.

hints.text: 🍇 I grow in a bunch.
🌱 I grow on a vine.
🍷 Some people make juice out of me.

food.question: I am yellow and spreadable. People put me on bread with jelly.

hints.text: 🥜 I can be made from nuts.
🍞 I taste good on bread.
🥪 You can make a sandwich with me.

food.question: I am a grain. You eat me with a spoon or fork and I am often served with sauce.

hints.text: 🍚 I am a common ingredient in many cuisines.
🌾 I come from a field.
🥢 People in Asia eat me with chopsticks.

food.question: I am made from potatoes. You cut me into strips and fry me.

hints.text: 🍟 I am often served with ketchup.
🥔 I start as a vegetable from the ground.
🔥 I am cooked in hot oil.

food.question: I am a dessert. I am cold and sweet and made from milk and sugar.

hints.text: 🍦 You might put sprinkles on top of me.
🥶 You need to keep me in the freezer.
🍨 I am often eaten in a cone.

weather.question: I fall from the sky and make everything wet. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 You need an umbrella when I come down!
☁️ I come from the clouds.
☔ Pitter-patter, pitter-patter!

weather.question: I am big and yellow and shine up high. What am I?

hints.text: 🔆 I help flowers grow.
😎 You might need sunglasses when I'm out.
🌞 I make it feel warm!

weather.question: I am white and fluffy and float in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I can look like a sheep!
💨 Sometimes I bring rain.
☁️ I am made of water droplets.

weather.question: I am cold and white and fall from the sky in winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ You can make snowballs with me.
🧤 Wear mittens when I fall.
☃️ Sometimes I make a snowman!

weather.question: I make the leaves dance and the trees sway. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 Sometimes I blow hats off!
🌬️ I can be gentle or strong.
💨 You can fly a kite when I'm around.

weather.question: I rumble and flash in the sky during a storm. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I am bright and loud!
⛈️ Sometimes I come with rain.
💡 You see me before you hear me.

weather.question: I am colorful and appear after the rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have many colors.
☀️ I need the sun and rain to appear.
🎨 I look like a painted arch in the sky.

weather.question: I am a very strong wind that spins around and around. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I can pick things up.
🏠 It's important to be safe inside when I come.
🌀 I look like a swirling cloud.

weather.question: I am a frozen rain that bounces when I fall. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 Ouch! Sometimes I can hurt.
🥶 I'm very cold.
🎾 I'm like little ice balls.

weather.question: I am a thick cloud that is close to the ground and makes it hard to see. What am I?

hints.text: 🌫️ Sometimes you can't see very far when I'm here.
🚗 Drivers need to be careful in me.
👻 I make everything look a bit mysterious.
